# gxg-icon

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The color of the icon. To see the                                                                                                                                                                                   | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | The size of the icon. Possible values: regular, small.                                                                                                                                                              | `string` | `"regular"` |
| `type`   | `type`    | The type of icon. Possible values: each of the icons in src/assets/icons. The value is always the name of the svg file without the "gxg-icon-" prefix. Example: the value for the "gxg-icon-add.svg" file is "add". | `string` | `"none"`    |
